message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.CY 

This paper proposes a new method for opinion extraction from user-generated content, specifically online customer reviews. The paper focuses on the application of this method to the domain of restaurants in Hawaii, indicating a focus on natural language processing and information retrieval (cs.CL) as well as machine learning and data mining (cs.LG). The use of topic modeling and sentiment analysis also suggests a potential fit for the sub-categories of information retrieval (cs.IR) and social and information networks (cs.SI). Finally, the paper's focus on user-generated content and sentiment analysis could also potentially fit within the sub-category of computers and society (cs.CY).
